sentences.english: As the police moved in, the hostages were running out, he said.
sentences.chinese: 随着警方进入该区域，人质也都四散跑出。

sentences.english: This list looks at 10 modern examples of hostage taking.
sentences.chinese: 这份目录选出10大现代人质挟持编列成表。

sentences.chinese: 警察试图说服挥舞刀具的男子释放人质。

sentences.english: At this point, he threatened to kill a hostage.
sentences.chinese: 在这个节骨眼上，他威胁杀死人质。

sentences.english: A Bocchicchio hostage was gilt - edged insurance.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一个卜启丘人质就等于最把稳的保证。

sentences.english: She talked composedly to reporters about her terrible ordeal.

sentences.english: Of course, each round will be faced with a huge upside-taking and release of pressure .
sentences.chinese: 当然，每一轮将面临一个巨大的倒人质和压力释放。

sentences.english: It was unclear what his relation to the hostage-taker was.

sentences.english: The seizure of American hostages in Iran sharpened the pain of national humiliation.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗扣押美国人质的行动加剧了国耻的痛苦。

sentences.english: The five hostages, the Holtzbergs among them, were dead.
sentences.chinese: 包括霍尔茨伯格在内的五名人质已经死亡。

sentences.english: There is no use having good laws if nobody enforces them.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有人质法，有好的法律又有何用。

sentences.english: She had asked Ser Barristan that question the afternoon the hostages went forth.
sentences.chinese: 送走人质当天下午她曾问过巴利斯坦爵士。

sentences.english: The children were detained as hostage in the underground.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们被扣押在地下通道里作人质。
